FuncDef: This command displays the scheduler hierarchy per customer multiservice site.
CLIs: customer <customer-id> site <customer-site-name> [ scheduler <scheduler-name> ] [ ingress | egress ] [ detail ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the ID number associated with a particular customer. Values-1 to 2147483647.
The unique name customer site name.
The unique scheduler name created in the context of the scheduler policy.
Displays ingress SAP customer scheduler stats.
Displays egress SAP customer scheduler stats.
